mapper.select: select id, pwd, name, nickName, tel, email, birth, sex, location1, location2, prt_Pattern as prtPattern, info_Status as infoStatus from member
mapper.update: insert into member(id, pwd, name, nickName, tel, email, birth, sex, location, prt_Pattern, info_Status) values(#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{nickName}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{sex}, #{address}, #{prtPattern}, #{infoStatus})
